headline.main: BRITISH GO ALL OUT FOR AID TO RUSSIA; People of Most Diverse Views Hail Stalin and the Soviet Union as Brave Allies

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 5 -- As the headlines say Moscow again is threatened and the campaign for the Caucasus is about to begin, British hopes and fears are fixed on Russia as never before.
abstract: Dispatch on Brit pub reaction to USSR campaign
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 5 -- As the headlines say Moscow again is threatened and the campaign for the Caucasus is about to begin, British hopes and fears are fixed on Russia as never before....
